claim_text: According to the World Bank, life expectancy at birth in Italy was 82.9 years in 2020.
According to Eurostat, life expectancy at birth in Italy was 82.4 years in 2020.
Italy's national statistics office, Istat, reported that life expectancy fell to 82 years in 2020.
According to Istat, life expectancy for men in Italy was 79.7 years in 2020.
According to Istat, life expectancy for women in Italy was 84.4 years in 2020.
